titleStmt.title: An epistle from our monethly meeting, at our publick meeting house in Reigate, in Surry, the 7th day of the 9th month, 1692
titleStmt.author: Society of Friends. Reigate Monthly Meeting.
Rigge, Ambrose, 1635?-1705.

notesStmt.note: At end: Written and signed in the behalf of the said meeting, by Ambrose Rigge.
Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
